models.name: econ_discuss_users
models.description: Platform accounts and identity records for econDiscuss. Holds login credentials, display identity, and preferences such as timezone and locale. Adds secure 2FA storage (secret and recovery codes) to meet policy. Primary reference for most other entities including {@link econ_discuss_user_profiles}, {@link econ_discuss_user_follows}, {@link econ_discuss_notifications}, {@link econ_discuss_user_reputations}, and {@link econ_discuss_reputation_events}.

plainFields.name: email
plainFields.description: User's unique email address for authentication and notifications. Store a normalized lowercased form at application layer for uniqueness semantics.

plainFields.name: password_hash
plainFields.description: Hashed password for email+password sign-in. Never store plaintext.

plainFields.name: display_name
plainFields.description: Publicly visible display name or handle.

plainFields.name: avatar_uri
plainFields.description: Optional avatar image URI for the profile. Keep within reasonable length (e.g., ≤ 2048 chars) and validate format in application.

plainFields.name: timezone
plainFields.description: IANA timezone identifier used for notifications, digests, and scheduling (e.g., Asia/Seoul).

plainFields.name: locale
plainFields.description: Preferred locale (e.g., en-US) for UI and communication.

plainFields.name: email_verified
plainFields.description: Whether the email address has been verified.

plainFields.name: mfa_enabled
plainFields.description: Whether multi-factor authentication is enabled for this account.

plainFields.name: mfa_secret
plainFields.description: Encrypted/managed secret for TOTP (or equivalent 2FA). Store encrypted and restrict access. Null when 2FA is not configured.

plainFields.name: mfa_recovery_codes
plainFields.description: Hashed or encrypted 2FA recovery codes (concatenated or structured storage). Rotated on regeneration. Null when 2FA not configured.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Record creation timestamp.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Record last update timestamp.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Soft deletion timestamp; null if active.

models.name: econ_discuss_user_profiles
models.description: Extended profile details for a user. Managed through the owning {@link econ_discuss_users} entity. Supports bio, affiliation, and web presence. Enables richer discovery while keeping base identity minimal.

plainFields.name: bio
plainFields.description: Short biography or professional summary.

plainFields.name: affiliation
plainFields.description: Current affiliation or organization string.

plainFields.name: website
plainFields.description: Personal or professional website URI.

plainFields.name: location
plainFields.description: Freeform location string for public display.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Record creation timestamp.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Record last update timestamp.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Soft deletion timestamp; null if active.

models.name: econ_discuss_visitors
models.description: Role assignment table indicating a user has the "visitor" role scope (read-only baseline). Although visitors generally represent unauthenticated contexts, this table captures explicit role assignment for edge or operational cases. Managed through {@link econ_discuss_users}.

plainFields.name: notes
plainFields.description: Optional notes about why this role assignment exists (e.g., operational testing, restricted mode).

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Assignment creation timestamp.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Assignment last update timestamp.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Soft deletion timestamp to end this role assignment.

models.name: econ_discuss_members
models.description: Role assignment table for standard platform members with participation privileges. Existence of a record implies member capabilities for the linked {@link econ_discuss_users} account.

plainFields.name: joined_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when member role became effective.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Record creation timestamp.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Record last update timestamp.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Soft deletion timestamp to end this role assignment.

models.name: econ_discuss_verified_experts
models.description: Role assignment for verified experts. Captures verification moment and optional validity window for expert badges. Referenced by discovery and gating policies via joins from {@link econ_discuss_users}.

plainFields.name: verified_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when expert verification was approved.

plainFields.name: badge_valid_until
plainFields.description: Optional expiration timestamp for the current expert badge.

plainFields.name: primary_domain
plainFields.description: Primary economics domain (e.g., Macroeconomics, Labor) for display and policy hints.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Record creation timestamp.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Record last update timestamp.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Soft deletion timestamp for revocation or expiry handling.

models.name: econ_discuss_moderators
models.description: Role assignment for moderators with governance permissions. Requires 2FA per policy. Managed through {@link econ_discuss_users}.

plainFields.name: enforced_2fa
plainFields.description: Whether 2FA enforcement is active for this moderator assignment per policy.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Record creation timestamp.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Record last update timestamp.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Soft deletion timestamp to end this role assignment.

models.name: econ_discuss_admins
models.description: Role assignment for platform administrators with full administrative privileges. Requires 2FA and dual-control for severe actions. Mirrors moderators with explicit 2FA enforcement flag. Managed through {@link econ_discuss_users}.

plainFields.name: superuser
plainFields.description: Whether this admin has superuser capabilities enabled by policy.

plainFields.name: enforced_2fa
plainFields.description: Whether 2FA enforcement is active for this admin assignment per policy.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Record creation timestamp.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Record last update timestamp.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Soft deletion timestamp to end this role assignment.

models.name: econ_discuss_user_follows
models.description: User-to-user follow relationships forming the social graph. Supports listing followers/following and feed personalization. Both follower and followee reference {@link econ_discuss_users}.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Follow creation timestamp.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Soft deletion timestamp; null if active.

models.name: econ_discuss_notifications
models.description: Persisted notifications delivered to recipients. Each record targets a recipient {@link econ_discuss_users} and may reference an actor {@link econ_discuss_users}. Business consumers list, filter, and mark-as-read/unread per user.

foreignFields.name: actor_user_id
foreignFields.description: Optional actor user's {@link econ_discuss_users.id} that triggered the notification.

plainFields.name: type
plainFields.description: Notification type key (business category identifier).

plainFields.name: title
plainFields.description: Short title or summary text for the notification.

plainFields.name: body
plainFields.description: Optional detailed body text; localized per user locale.

plainFields.name: entity_type
plainFields.description: Optional target entity type (e.g., post, comment, poll).

plainFields.name: entity_id
plainFields.description: Optional target entity identifier for deep-linking (no FK to allow polymorphism).

plainFields.name: read_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the recipient read this notification; null if unread.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Notification creation timestamp (send time).

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Record last update timestamp.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Soft deletion timestamp for recipient-side removal.

models.name: econ_discuss_user_reputations
models.description: Current reputation aggregate per user, derived from {@link econ_discuss_reputation_events}. Stores the latest computed score and timestamp for quick gating checks while preserving full historical detail in the ledger.

plainFields.name: score
plainFields.description: Current reputation score for the user (non-negative integer).

plainFields.name: last_updated_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the score was last recalculated.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Record creation timestamp.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Record last update timestamp.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Soft deletion timestamp for this aggregate, if deprecated.

models.name: econ_discuss_reputation_events
models.description: Immutable ledger of reputation-impacting events for users. Each entry captures points, reason, and optional linkage to a content item (e.g., a {@link econ_discuss_posts}). Serves as the audit trail and supports recomputation of {@link econ_discuss_user_reputations}.

foreignFields.name: actor_user_id
foreignFields.description: Optional actor user's {@link econ_discuss_users.id} who caused the event (e.g., curator, voter).

foreignFields.name: post_id
foreignFields.description: Optional related post's {@link econ_discuss_posts.id} for content-scoped events.

plainFields.name: points
plainFields.description: Signed integer delta applied to the user’s reputation for this event (caps and decay applied externally).

plainFields.name: reason
plainFields.description: Human-readable reason or category for the points change (e.g., upvote_post, curated_feature, moderation_penalty).

plainFields.name: source
plainFields.description: Optional source system or process identifier for traceability.

plainFields.name: occurred_at
plainFields.description: When the underlying action occurred; used for time-window calculations and decay.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Ledger entry creation timestamp.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Record last update timestamp (rare in append-only ledgers).

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Soft deletion timestamp for exceptional corrections; null in normal operation.

models.name: econ_discuss_expert_domain_badges
models.description: Per-domain expert badges assigned to verified experts. Normalizes expertise domains as a junction between {@link econ_discuss_users} and curated topics in {@link econ_discuss_topics}. Captures lifecycle with verified_at, optional valid_until, and optional revocation metadata. Supports expert-only filters and discovery surfaces while preserving auditability.

plainFields.name: verified_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the domain badge was approved for the user.

plainFields.name: valid_until
plainFields.description: Optional expiration timestamp for the domain badge; null if perpetual until policy change or revocation.

plainFields.name: revoked_at
plainFields.description: Optional timestamp when the domain badge was revoked for policy reasons.

plainFields.name: revoked_reason
plainFields.description: Optional human-readable rationale for revocation (secured to governance staff).

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Record creation timestamp.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Record last update timestamp.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Soft deletion timestamp to retire this badge record.

models.name: econ_discuss_topics
models.description: Curated taxonomy of economics subjects used for organizing content and personalization. Managed primarily by admins/moderators with clear naming and optional description. Serves as the authoritative list of topics referenced by {@link econ_discuss_post_topics} and user subscriptions in {@link econ_discuss_user_topic_subscriptions}. Includes temporal fields for audit and soft deletion. Supports search through text indexes on name and description.

plainFields.name: code
plainFields.description: Immutable business identifier (slug-like) for the topic. Used in URLs and external references; unique across all topics.

plainFields.name: name
plainFields.description: Human-readable topic name shown to users. Used for search and display.

plainFields.name: description
plainFields.description: Optional longer description of the topic’s scope and purpose for curation context and tooltips.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Creation timestamp of the topic record.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Last update timestamp of the topic record.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Soft deletion timestamp. When set, the topic is considered archived/removed from user-facing lists while preserved for audit.

models.name: econ_discuss_user_topic_subscriptions
models.description: User-to-topic subscription relationship representing personalization preferences. Each record indicates that a user follows a topic to prioritize related content and digests. References {@link econ_discuss_users} and {@link econ_discuss_topics}. Designed for efficient queries by user and by topic, auditability via temporal fields, and uniqueness per (user, topic).

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Creation timestamp when the subscription was established.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Last update timestamp of this subscription record.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Soft deletion timestamp. When set, the subscription is considered inactive but retained for audit and possible restoration.

models.name: econ_discuss_posts
models.description: Authored, published content items forming the core discussion surface. Each post is created by a user and is discoverable via search, topic associations, and timelines. Related entities like votes, bookmarks, polls, and live threads exist in other components and reference this table. Supports scheduled publishing via scheduled_publish_at and maintains publication timestamps for feeds. Version history is captured in {@link econ_discuss_post_snapshots}.

foreignFields.name: econ_discuss_user_id
foreignFields.description: Author user's {@link econ_discuss_users.id}. Identifies who created the post.

plainFields.name: title
plainFields.description: Human-readable post title for listing and SEO. Required at publish time.

plainFields.name: body
plainFields.description: Main content body in sanitized, possibly markdown-like format. Used for full-text search.

plainFields.name: summary
plainFields.description: Optional short abstract or excerpt for previews and feeds.

plainFields.name: published_at
plainFields.description: Publication timestamp. Supports chronological feeds and scheduling validations. May equal created_at on immediate publish.

plainFields.name: scheduled_publish_at
plainFields.description: Optional scheduled time for future publication (stored in UTC, displayed in user timezone). Used to validate scheduling windows and drive publisher jobs.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Creation timestamp for the post record.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Last update timestamp for the post record.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Soft deletion timestamp when the post is removed from public visibility.

models.name: econ_discuss_post_drafts
models.description: Private, autosaved drafts authored by users for long-form writing before publication. Drafts are not publicly visible and support cross-device synchronization and conflict resolution in application logic. Optionally linked to a resulting published post for traceability. {@link econ_discuss_users} authors; optional link to {@link econ_discuss_posts}.

foreignFields.name: econ_discuss_user_id
foreignFields.description: Author user's {@link econ_discuss_users.id}. Owner of this draft.

foreignFields.name: econ_discuss_post_id
foreignFields.description: Optional linkage to the published post's {@link econ_discuss_posts.id} created from this draft (if any). Multiple drafts may relate to one post.

plainFields.name: title
plainFields.description: Working draft title. Optional to allow early autosave before title is chosen.

plainFields.name: body
plainFields.description: Working draft body content. Optional to support early autosaves.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Creation timestamp for the draft.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Last update timestamp for the draft (used by autosave sync and ordering).

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Soft deletion timestamp when the draft is discarded.

models.name: econ_discuss_post_topics
models.description: Junction association between posts and curated topics to support filtering, discovery, and subscriptions. Enforces uniqueness per (post, topic). {@link econ_discuss_posts} to {@link econ_discuss_topics}. Includes additional recency index for topic pages.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Creation timestamp for the association.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Last update timestamp for the association.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Soft deletion timestamp when the association is logically removed.

models.name: econ_discuss_post_snapshots
models.description: Historical snapshots of {@link econ_discuss_posts} capturing the exact state of a post at a point in time for auditability and public version history. Each snapshot stores the full text fields and publication state. Versions are unique per post and are typically append-only.

foreignFields.name: econ_discuss_user_id
foreignFields.description: Editor/author’s {@link econ_discuss_users.id} responsible for this snapshot.

plainFields.name: version
plainFields.description: Monotonic version number per post. Combined with post_id to enforce uniqueness.

plainFields.name: title
plainFields.description: Snapshot of the post title at this version.

plainFields.name: body
plainFields.description: Snapshot of the post body at this version.

plainFields.name: summary
plainFields.description: Snapshot of the post summary at this version.

plainFields.name: published_at
plainFields.description: Post’s published_at value at the time of snapshot (null if unpublished).

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Snapshot creation timestamp (when this version was recorded).

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Last update timestamp for this snapshot record (rarely used; retained for consistency).

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Soft deletion timestamp for exceptional corrections; normally null in append-only operation.

models.name: econ_discuss_post_votes
models.description: Post voting interactions supporting both upvotes and downvotes with full lifecycle states. Each record represents a single member’s vote on a specific post and maintains idempotency via a unique (user, post) constraint. Includes status tracking to support switching/withdrawal windows and integrity outcomes (discounted/invalidated). References {@link econ_discuss_users} as voter and {@link econ_discuss_posts} as target post. Optimized for time-window analytics and user-private history.

plainFields.name: vote_type
plainFields.description: Type of vote: allowed values are "up" or "down". Used for content aggregates, reputation weighting, and trending windows.

plainFields.name: status
plainFields.description: Lifecycle state of the vote: allowed values are "active", "withdrawn", "switched", "discounted", or "invalidated". Application logic enforces transitions and time windows.

plainFields.name: status_reason
plainFields.description: Optional reason/category when status is discounted/invalidated (e.g., integrity_violation, moderation_invalidation).

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Vote creation timestamp for history and time-window analytics.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Vote last update timestamp (e.g., on switch/withdrawal or moderation outcome).

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Soft delete timestamp for exceptional removals. Prefer status transitions over deletion for auditability.

models.name: econ_discuss_post_bookmarks
models.description: User saved-item relationships for posts with owner-only personal notes. Each record indicates that a member saved a given post to their personal bookmarks. Enforces idempotent saves via unique (user, post). References {@link econ_discuss_users} as owner and {@link econ_discuss_posts} as saved post. Notes remain private to the owner (application-enforced).

plainFields.name: note
plainFields.description: Owner-only personal note attached to the saved item. Excluded from any shared collection views and external exports to others.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Bookmark creation timestamp used for listing, sorting, and export.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the bookmark record was last updated (including note edits).

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Soft delete timestamp to support reversible unbookmark operations, audit trails, and delayed purging.

models.name: econ_discuss_polls
models.description: Poll entity attached to a post with explicit support for multiple question types (single choice, multiple choice, Likert, ranking, numeric estimate), visibility modes, expert-only eligibility, vote-change policy, and per-type configuration. One-to-one with {@link econ_discuss_posts}. Options are stored in {@link econ_discuss_poll_options}. Responses reside in {@link econ_discuss_poll_responses} with selections in {@link econ_discuss_poll_response_options} for multi-select and ranking.

foreignFields.name: econ_discuss_post_id
foreignFields.description: Host post's {@link econ_discuss_posts.id}. Exactly one poll per post.

plainFields.name: question
plainFields.description: Poll prompt shown to voters.

plainFields.name: question_type
plainFields.description: Type of question: single_choice, multiple_choice, likert, ranking, numeric_estimate. Application enforces valid values.

plainFields.name: visibility_mode
plainFields.description: Visibility mode: hidden_until_close (default), visible_after_vote, always_visible (policy may disallow for expert-only).

plainFields.name: expert_only
plainFields.description: Whether voting/participation is restricted to verified experts and staff.

plainFields.name: allow_vote_change
plainFields.description: Whether respondents may change their vote prior to poll closure. Default business policy: enabled.

plainFields.name: min_voter_reputation
plainFields.description: Optional minimum voter reputation required to participate (members below are ineligible).

plainFields.name: min_account_age_hours
plainFields.description: Optional minimum account age in hours for eligibility (e.g., 48).

plainFields.name: min_selections
plainFields.description: For multiple_choice: minimum number of selections required.

plainFields.name: max_selections
plainFields.description: For multiple_choice: maximum number of selections allowed (≤ number of options).

plainFields.name: scale_points
plainFields.description: For likert: number of scale points (commonly 5 or 7).

plainFields.name: scale_min_label
plainFields.description: For likert: label for the minimum endpoint.

plainFields.name: scale_max_label
plainFields.description: For likert: label for the maximum endpoint.

plainFields.name: scale_mid_label
plainFields.description: For likert: optional midpoint label.

plainFields.name: unit_label
plainFields.description: For numeric_estimate: unit label (e.g., %, index points).

plainFields.name: numeric_min
plainFields.description: For numeric_estimate: minimum allowed value.

plainFields.name: numeric_max
plainFields.description: For numeric_estimate: maximum allowed value.

plainFields.name: numeric_step
plainFields.description: For numeric_estimate: step size/precision for rounding.

plainFields.name: start_at
plainFields.description: Scheduled start time when the poll opens for responses (optional).

plainFields.name: end_at
plainFields.description: Scheduled end time after which responses are closed (optional).

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Creation timestamp for audit and ordering.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Last update timestamp for audit and cache invalidation.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Soft deletion timestamp. When set, the poll is considered removed from active use.

models.name: econ_discuss_poll_options
models.description: Answer options for a given poll. Each option belongs to one {@link econ_discuss_polls} and participates in per-poll uniqueness and display ordering. Managed through the parent poll lifecycle.

plainFields.name: option_text
plainFields.description: Display text for the option. Must be unique within the same poll.

plainFields.name: position
plainFields.description: Zero- or one-based position for deterministic display ordering within a poll.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Creation timestamp.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Last update timestamp.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Soft deletion timestamp to retire an option without losing history.

models.name: econ_discuss_poll_responses
models.description: One response per (poll, user) capturing lifecycle status, timestamps, and type-specific values. Option selections are recorded in {@link econ_discuss_poll_response_options} to support multiple choice and ranking. Likert responses use likert_value; numeric estimate uses numeric_value. Withdrawals and integrity actions are modeled via status and withdrawn_at.

plainFields.name: status
plainFields.description: Response status: active, withdrawn, quarantined, invalidated. Used for moderation and integrity flows.

plainFields.name: likert_value
plainFields.description: For likert: selected integer value within the defined scale points.

plainFields.name: numeric_value
plainFields.description: For numeric_estimate: submitted numeric value (unit and bounds on poll).

plainFields.name: withdrawn_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the respondent withdrew their vote (if applicable).

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Response creation timestamp used for user history and time-window analytics.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Last update timestamp (e.g., when editing within allowed window).

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Soft deletion timestamp. When set, the response is removed from active tallies; moderation may also use status to indicate reason.

models.name: econ_discuss_poll_response_options
models.description: Junction table linking a response to one or more options, enabling multiple choice and ranking support. When ranking is used, the position field stores the order assigned by the respondent (1 = highest). For single-choice questions, there will be exactly one row per response.

plainFields.name: position
plainFields.description: For ranking questions: position order (1..N). Null for non-ranking types.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Creation timestamp for the selection record.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Last update timestamp for the selection record.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Soft deletion timestamp to remove a selection without losing audit trail.

models.name: econ_discuss_live_threads
models.description: Represents a live discussion thread (room) attached to a specific post. One-to-one with {@link econ_discuss_posts}. Tracks lifecycle state (scheduled, waiting, live, paused, ended, archived), configuration flags (e.g., expert-only), access scope governance, and key timestamps for operations. Messages are stored in {@link econ_discuss_live_messages}. Managed independently from the post for starting, pausing, ending, and archiving workflows.

foreignFields.name: econ_discuss_post_id
foreignFields.description: Host post's {@link econ_discuss_posts.id}. Exactly one live thread per post.

foreignFields.name: host_user_id
foreignFields.description: Host user's {@link econ_discuss_users.id} who can start/pause/end this live thread. Co-hosts/participants may be modeled separately.

plainFields.name: state
plainFields.description: Lifecycle state of the live thread. Allowed values (application-enforced): scheduled, waiting, live, paused, ended, archived.

plainFields.name: expert_only
plainFields.description: Whether participation is restricted to verified experts and staff (expert-only mode). Reading may remain broader per policy.

plainFields.name: access_scope
plainFields.description: Access scope for participation/visibility. Allowed values (application-enforced): public, followers_only, topic_subscribers_only, invite_only.

plainFields.name: scheduled_start_at
plainFields.description: Planned start time for scheduled rooms (displayed in user’s timezone; stored canonical in UTC).

plainFields.name: started_at
plainFields.description: Actual start time when the room transitions to live.

plainFields.name: paused_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the room was paused. Null when not paused.

plainFields.name: ended_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the room ended. Null if still ongoing.

plainFields.name: archived_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the room was archived and made read-only.

plainFields.name: slow_mode_interval_seconds
plainFields.description: Optional slow-mode interval (in seconds) limiting how frequently a participant may post messages.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Creation timestamp of the live thread entity.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Last update timestamp of the live thread entity.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Soft deletion timestamp. When set, the thread is no longer active but retained for audit/restore windows.

models.name: econ_discuss_live_messages
models.description: Live chat messages belonging to {@link econ_discuss_live_threads}. Authored by users from {@link econ_discuss_users}. Stores raw message content, type, and lifecycle timestamps for ordering and limited edits. Used to render real-time streams and archived transcripts. Author is nullable to preserve transcripts when user accounts are deleted/anonymized.

foreignFields.name: econ_discuss_user_id
foreignFields.description: Author user’s {@link econ_discuss_users.id}. Nullable to preserve transcripts by anonymizing author when the user is deleted.

plainFields.name: message_type
plainFields.description: Type of message for rendering/controls. Allowed values (application-enforced): text, system, poll_prompt, poll_result, moderation_notice, pinned.

plainFields.name: content
plainFields.description: Message body text (for system/control messages this may be short explanatory text).

plainFields.name: pinned
plainFields.description: Whether this message is currently pinned for context within the live thread.

plainFields.name: edited_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp of last edit within allowed edit window. Null if never edited.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Creation timestamp; also serves as the chronological ordering key for fan-out and transcript views.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Last update timestamp (e.g., pin/unpin, edit).

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Soft deletion timestamp for moderated or removed messages while preserving transcript placeholders as required.
